node.text:
Every sunset is an opportunity to reset. Give Netflix a pass and watch an unhurried sunset for a change at the open-air Sky Bar at The Raviz Kovalam. An exhaustive list of classic drinks and a range of Tapas will set the tone of your evening.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
